channel.title: crab on Maiche Jewan
channel.description: Recent content in crab on Maiche Jewan

item.title: Crab masala
item.description: Ingredients: 1 kg, crabs 1⁄4 cup coriander leaves, chopped fine Roast and grind 2 onions, large, finely sliced 2 tomatoes, medium, finely sliced 2 tsp coriander powder 1 tsp cumin powder 1 tsp black mustard seeds 6-7 garlic cloves 1 1⁄2” ginger, minced 3 green chilies 1 tsp black pepper corns 3 cloves 2 cinnamon sticks, small 1 pinch ova 1⁄2 tsp fennel seeds 8 red chillies (long and short) 1⁄2 tsp turmeric powder 1⁄2 fresh coconut, grated 2 tbsp oil salt, as per taste Method: Clean and cut the crabs into two halves and keep aside.
